localized title: Kuku Mathur Ki Jhand Ho Gayi
plot outline: An easy going, middle class delhite boy, kuku, feels betrayed when his best friend decides to opt for his family business leaving him all torn up. Kuku's cousin, Prabhakar bhaiya, arrives just in time to help him through this phase of his life.
title: Kuku Mathur Ki Jhand Ho Gayi
plot: When Kuku's friend is unable to give him enough time, he uses improper ways to get him back.

An easy going, middle class delhite boy, kuku, feels betrayed when his best friend decides to opt for his family business leaving him all torn up. Kuku's cousin, Prabhakar bhaiya, arrives just in time to help him through this phase of his life.
synopsis: Kuku, a motherless boy tries to find his happiness with his childhood friend Ronnie Gulati. Living with his father and younger sister, Kuku possess an inborn talent for cooking but his not so well off family proves as a hinderance to his dreams. However, Ronnie, born in a joint family has a wealthy father to support and he soon becomes engrossed in his business, a start up given by his father. Unable to dedicate time to his buddy Kuku, the two have a rift. But not ending at that, an enraged Kuku plots to avenge his friend by burning his godown and using the goods there to fulfill his dreams of being a cook.
